sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.sc_ic_Column</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Wrapper class for Item Creator question layout columns</description>
        <name>sc_ic_Column</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var sc_ic_Column = Class.create();
sc_ic_Column.prototype = Object.extendsObject(sc_ic_Base, {
    initialize: function(_gr,_gs) {
		sc_ic_Base.prototype.initialize.call(this,_gr,_gs);
		this._defnChgFld = {
			"index": true
		};
    },
	
	columnChanged: function() {
		for (var key in this._defnChgFld)
			if (this._defnChgFld[key] && this._gr[key].changes()) {
				this._log.debug("[columnChanged] Column has changed");
				return true;
			}
		
		return false;
	},

	setLayoutChangedOnItem: function() {
		var iGr = new GlideRecord(sc_ic.ITEM_STAGING);
		if (iGr.get(this._gr[sc_ic.SECTION][sc_ic.ITEM_STAGING])) {
			this._log.debug("[setLayoutChangedOnItem] Changed Item " + iGr.getDisplayValue());
			sc_ic_Factory.wrap(iGr).layoutChanged();
		}
	},
	
	publish: function() {
	},
	
	isUsedByQuestions: function() {
		var questionGr = new GlideAggregate(sc_ic.QUESTION);
		questionGr.addQuery(sc_ic.COLUMN, this._gr.getUniqueValue());
		questionGr.addAggregate("COUNT");
		questionGr.query();
		
		if (questionGr.next() & questionGr.getAggregate("COUNT") > 0)
			return true;
			
		return false;
	},

    type: 'sc_ic_Column'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>chris.henson</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2013-12-18 11:15:49</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>8de2ee58c33111003d2ae219cdba8ffa</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>sc_ic_Column</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Service Catalog Platform" source="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.platform">6d218d0f6d2620100acb70b35343303c</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8de2ee58c33111003d2ae219cdba8ffa</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>nigel.bell</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2014-03-04 10:43:02</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>1132</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
